activities: ESPO Technologies d/b/a ESPO Systems provides remote installation services of Websense (www.websense.com) IT Security Products.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: ESPO does not come into contact with any "personal data" via our remote installations.  However, we do leverage IT Security Controls (DLP Primarily) via the Websense Security Tools that our engineers install for Websense clients.
privacyprograms: International Information Systems Security Certification Consortium ((ISC)²)
recoursemech: Compliance with private sector developed privacy programs that incorporate the Safe Harbor Principles into our rules that include effective enforcement mechanisms of the type described in Enforcement Principles.
